alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 8:55PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Vilas and western Oneida Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 854 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Border Lakes Natural Area to near Lac Du Flambeau to near Phillips. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lac Du Flambeau, Border Lakes Natural Area and Rice Creek Natural Area around 900 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Johnson Lake Barrens Natural Area, Boulder Junction, Willow Lake and Willow Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
